title: Coronavirus and sport: How sporting world changed during March - in pictures
description: A selection of striking imagery showing how sport has been affected by the coronavirus pandemic in March.
content:
A selection of striking photographs showing how sport has been affected by the coronavirus pandemic in March.
Wembley Stadium, London, 1 March: The month started with Manchester City celebrating their third League Cup win in succession - and their fourth in … [+2942 chars]
